name: Offering of Oink
description:
The world is in chaos, Dionysus is furious, the mortals have forgotten to make an offering to the god of wine. It is up to you, the chosen villager to travel to the palace of Dionysus and bring an offering worthy of the god of wine.

In Offering of Oink you play as a lowly mortal peasant who has been chosen to bring an offering to the god of wine. But the way to the god is perilous and dangerous as the god  bombards the mortals with containers of wine to make is displeasure known.

Jump over the various objects Dionysus throws at you and make your way to the top where the god resides, but be careful, the sacrifice is heavy and makes it impossible for you to jump.

Controls:

D: move right
A: move left
W/ SPACEBAR: jump
Left Shift: Dash

Controls while carrying the sacrifice:

D: move right
A: move left
Left Shift: Dash
Left Mouse Click: Throw Sacrifice
